definition: extremely large pelagic tropical ray that feeds on plankton and small fishes
details:
noun
- extremely large pelagic tropical ray that feeds on plankton and small fishes
= synonyms: manta
- bottom-living cephalopod having a soft oval body with eight long tentacles
= synonyms: octopus
- medium-sized greyish-black whale of the northern Pacific
= synonyms: grey whale, gray whale
